body:
Good on the author on the first one. He left it open so people can choose if she dropped the fat guy and kept the mc. Or she dropped the mc or she kept the cucking route. 
8/10 just for giving a choice to the reader which is unusual. Would give higher if she made more sense for her cucking choice and better art.
She just ran dude. I don't recommend, i recommend taking a bath before anything else because that's a really bad decision and you might get ptsd for the rest of your life

Dishonest whores all around in these stories... That first one...bullshit, she loves him. If doing it once with him wasn't enough...then why didn't she just SIMPLY ask him to keep going? :/ Just give him a moment to rest and get it up again...he's young, it wouldn't have taken long. Instead she immediately seeks the other guy out. So, bullshit she loved him. I hope he finds out what she was doing this whole time and drops her ass. Curious what she told him at the end, though...
Dude below be do be spittin some facts
hey man don't diss king kong , kong is way handsome than that ugly mother fucker
Did they have to make him such an ugly pos? Dude looks like king kong with a head that big.
